root: ^Buff Rat: Speak if you want Love Advice for your current situation.
^Buff Rat: Don't speak if you want Love Advice for "Botched Dating Sim" (Download on Itch.io for free today!)
^Buff Rat: Okay, let me tell you a little secret, young one.
^Buff Rat: I have met the wise old man at the pond.JPEG.
^Buff Rat: I have read his source code.
^Buff Rat: I have since escaped that universe to come into this one, but I shall lend you a hand.
^Buff Rat: So that I can repent for all my misdeeds in my past life.
^Buff Rat: For I am a new person reborn.
^You wonder what nonsense the rat is spewing out at you.
^Buff Rat: I may be a scammer now, but that is because people choose to  get scammed by me!
^Buff Rat: In order to end up together with both Jane Doe and John Smith, you must romance the couple simultaneously.
^Buff Rat: Then, on the last day, you must choose to risk it all on a- ahem.
^Buff Rat: I have said too much.
